SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Interface BoardView

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Board
public interface BoardView extends Serializable
Read-only object which represent the board of an in-progress game.

The board is diamond-shaped, but is represented in memory as a matrix of BOARD_ROWSxBOARD_COLUMNS and valid cells are indicated with isValidTile(int, int).
